attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,I want to draw your attention to the state of our newspapers & magazines in GB.
I'm fed up of seeing half naked and pornographic images on so many of our papers!I want to see a law against these sort of images & a law to abolish pornography of all types.Many thanks for your time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
